definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]

sentences.english: Shortened words and expressions has been a universal phenomenon since the pre-Qin dynasty period.
sentences.chinese: 詞語簡縮是自先秦至現代漢語存在的一種普遍現象。

sentences.english: The director abbreviated the film to let his friends see the shortened version.
sentences.chinese: 導演請他朋友們看的是這部電影他刪節後的簡縮版。

sentences.english: Boil down the article to a few sentences.
sentences.chinese: 把這篇文章簡縮到只有幾個句子。

sentences.english: History reduces the carnage to impersonal numbers.
sentences.chinese: 歷史敘述把大屠殺簡縮成了冷冰冰的數字。

sentences.english: Typical Use:His book was abbreviated and appeared in a public magazine.
sentences.chinese: 他的書被簡縮刊出在一本公衆的雜誌上。
